alert.note: Alert for Marinette (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Shelter in Place Warning issued October 07 at 2:04PM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...SHELTER IN PLACE NOTICE FOR A PORTION OF THE CITY OF MARINETTE... The following message is transmitted at the request of the Local Emergency Management. The City of Marinette is issuing a shelter-in-place notice for a portion of the City due to an industrial fire in the City of Menominee, MI with smoke blowing into the city of Marinette. The area involved includes the Menominee River by Resolute Forest Products and the area from Shore Drive east to the bay. To shelter-in- place: · Go inside and take any pets with you. · Close and lock all windows and doors. · Turn off fans, air conditioner, and furnace. Close the fireplace damper. · Go to an internal room without windows if possible. · Seal off the door and windows if possible. · Wait for an all clear.
